content: Here's a draft of the wiki page for the Sept. Connectathon. Have a look.
Feel free to make additions and corrections.
Do we want to add information to about the FhIR proficiency exam to the Connectathon wiki page?
OK, I'll add a separate section for that and the tutorials specifically for that exam.
We will need to update the page with whatever the version of the FHIR specification the Connectathon is using. Has that been decided or is that decision yet to occur?
it will still be 3.0.1 as the official base, though some streams might use some other version
we haven't considered publishing a frozen version of R4 candidate for this connectathon yet. No one has asked, and I haven't seen any implication in the streams yet
